name: SplitBros
description:
A cooperative dungeon crawler where two players have to share the same weapon. 2-players only.

"You lost your way in a dangerous maze, now you need to find your friend again!
Not only the screen is shared but your life too. When you hold the sword your mate is defenseless... but don’t worry, your friendship can overcome the split screen.
Fight along (and with) your friend."

Compatible with joypad and keyboard.

(This is an early prototype developed in the school years).
